Welcome to Terratris!

The game of Tetris has been around for more than 35 years. Although many variations have been made, the classic game remains the most popular precisely because of its simplicity. Iâ€™ve never found a particularly relaxing skin for Tetris, so I decided to make one for both of us.

Here are a few commands to get you started:

  • ← and →  move your piece laterally
  • ↓  accelerates the drop of your piece
  • spacebar  drops your piece
  • p  pauses the game

Ok, now go play Tetris and let me know how far you make it!



Credits to Patrick Pietschmann for Tetris Variation A on piano, Studio Ghibli for the background art, and Chilli Con Code for Pure CSS Totoro.
